entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 30 percent chance of rain showers overnight then 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
